channel.title: CVE Feed for The Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ, Ltd. -- The Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ, Ltd. App for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ, Ltd. -- The Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ, Ltd. App for Android

item.title: CVE-2016-7812|2024-08-06T02:04:56.096Z -- the%20bank%20of%20tokyo-mitsubishi%20ufj%2C%20ltd. -- the%20bank%20of%20tokyo-mitsubishi%20ufj%2C%20ltd.%20app%20for%20android
item.description: The Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ, Ltd. App for Android ver5.3.1, ver5.2.2 and earlier allow a man-in-the-middle attacker to downgrade the communication between the app and the server from TLS v1.2 to SSL v3.0, which may result in the attacker to eavesdrop on an encrypted communication.
